experience.title: Director - Ecosystem and Partnerships
experience.description: Krystal Ventures Studio, an initiative promoted by R&D Capital, envisions an eco-system to facilitate startup growth and development, enabling them to be viewed as ‘an asset class’ by our select group of investors.We provide our investors a ring side view of investing in startups. The promoters of R&D Capital bring in world class experience in wealth management, financial advisory, investment banking and business management.Our motto is ‘Success with Clarity’.We bring qualitative and quantitative parameters in our approach for an investor-friendly outcome, both in terms of exits and returns and for a scalable business model for startups.Our ‘Studio’ is a platform that connects the startups needs and investor’s interest. Reach out to us on info@krystalvs.com
